None.Name: Uproar
None.Description: Every 2 second, the tower delivers several shots each dealing 56 damage to enemies within a 5m radius, up to 84 in total. It may attack two targets at once.

None.Name: Gifted Retreat
None.Description: Friendly Bandit units within a 25m radius around the tower regenerate 70 life points every second.

None.Name: Life Stealer
None.Description: 15% of the damage dealt by the building will repair the building and restore its life points.
